channel.title: Need help with several questions!
channel.description:
I need help with these:
1:I want to know how to change into a npc.
2: I want to know how to change your start point when you log in my server for the first time.
3:I want to know how to make all anceint spells work
4: I want to know how to add objects and when you "oporate" them, they give exp or something
5: How do i change my servers name from documents?
6: I want to know how to deleate NPCs and add them to a place to stay forever and get dealted forever.
7: I want to know how to change a Npcs hp
Thank -you . if all of these could be answered correctly i would be great ful![br][size=1]Posted on: May 04, 2007, 06:58:57 PM[/size][hr]Also, how do i make NPCs talk if there selling sometihng at a shop or just say something random?

item.title: Need help with several questions!
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

Questions

1:I want to know how to change into a npc.

2: I want to know how to change your start point when you log in my server for the first time.

3:I want to know how to make all anceint spells work

4: I want to know how to add objects and when you “oporate” them, they give exp or something

5: How do i change my servers name from documents?

6: I want to know how to deleate NPCs and add them to a place to stay forever and get dealted forever.

7: I want to know how to change a Npcs hp

Answers

[ul][li]1. add the ::pnpc code to your source.[/li]
[li]2. Go to you Player.java file “ctrl+f” search for “start” or “Start Point” Then change the X and Y cords.[/li]
[li]3.Find a tut on it theres tons.[/li]
[li]4.Many tuts on that on to.[/li]
[li]5. To change the name just delete the name of old one. Re-type your name. Simple enough[/li]
[li]6. Autospawn.cfg Add the monsters ID and the coordinates. Height = 0[/li]
[li]7. Npc.cfg file. Change hp and combat lvl there.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with several questions!
item.dc:creator: @pwned_i_lvl3 pwned i lvl3
item.description:
@pwned_i_lvl3 wrote:

answer 1: go into your source and click characters, click your char name, where it says, rights = 0 change the 0 to a 3
then in-game type: ::pnpc (npc ID) some don’t work…

answer6: the question makes no sence u cant make it there nd delete it at the same time???

answer 7: go to npc.cfg and change the hp?

Read full topic
